title: Heart ink injection
procedures:
1. Anesthetize the mouse
  2. Using a 1 ml syringe withdraw 0,5 ml of mouse blood from the heart ventricle 
  3. Inject 1 ml of China Ink and wait for 30 sec \(until the eyes, mouth and legs became black)
  4. Quickly dissect and fix in 4% PFA over night at 4°C
  5. Treat the sample with a solution of 0,5% KOH for one day 
  6. Treat the sample with a solution of 0,5% KOH/Glycarol 2:1 one day
  7. Treat the sample with a solution of 0,5% KOH/Glycerol 1:1 for one day
  8. Treat the sample with 100% Glycerol for one day \(in order to visualize clearly all the inner blood vessels)
